A treatyse made by Johan Lambert vnto kynge Henry the .viij. concerynge hys opynyon in the sacrame[n]t of the aultre as they call it, or supper of the lorde as the scripture nameth it. Anno do. 1538 Lambert, John, d. 1538. Bale, John, 1495-1563.
32 leaves
D. van der Straten, [Wesel : 1548?]
Edited by John Bale. Imprint from STC. Running title reads: Johan Lambertes sentence, to kynge Henry the viij. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
